segments.text: I notice the woman is completely focused on drying that plate, oblivious to everything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring over the sink, and she doesn't even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really going for it, trying to get those cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so eager, waiting for her share of the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the stool is about to tip over, and that could be really bad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, in her own little world, drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she will ever notice what's happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so serene and well-kept, it's a stark contrast to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the children don't get into too much trouble for taking those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really pushing his limits, trying to reach that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone should really turn off that faucet before the kitchen gets flooded.
segments.speaker: PAR
